membership:

http://www.web3d.org/about/members-and-liaisons
goals__remit:
Founded in 1997, we are an International, non-profit, member-funded, industry standards development organization. We develop and maintain royalty-free ISO standards for web-based 3D graphics. Our standard   X3D (Extensible 3D) originated from VRML and is available in XML, Compressed Binary, and classic VRML formats. X3D is open, royalty free, extensible, interoperable, and runs on all platforms including desktops, tablets, and phones. Our members are from business, academia, government and the military. 
 
These international standards are known as : 
ISO/IEC 19775 eXtensible 3D - X3D 
ISO/IEC 14772 VRML97 
ISO/IEC 19774 Humanoid Animation (H-Anim)
relevant_communication:
Web3D 2005 - 9th international conference on 3D Web technologies - Bangor, Wales, UK 
Web3D 2007 - 11th international conference on 3D Web technologies - Perugia, Italy 
Web3D 2009 - 13th international conference on 3D Web technologies - Darmstadt, Germany 
Web3D 2011 - 15th international conference on 3D Web technologies, June 17-21 - Paris, France 
Web3D 2013 - 17th international conference on 3D Web technologies, June 16-20 - San Sebastian, Spain 
Web3D 2015 - 20th international conference on 3D Web technologies, June 18-21 - Heraklion, Crete, Greece 
1st VR Hackhaton, January 15-17, 2016 Brussels, Belgium 
2d VR Hackhaton, October 24, 2016 Brussels, Belgium
